user.description: Select your Mazda Connected Services region.

authorize.description:
1. Click the link below to open the Mazda login page:

[Log in to Mazda]({authorize_url})

2. Log in with your MyMazda credentials.
3. After login, your browser will try to redirect to a URL starting with `msauth://` — the page may show an error.
4. Copy the **full URL** from your browser's address bar and paste it below.
